results.name: Theta series of f.c.c. lattice with respect to edge.
reference: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
N. J. A. Sloane and B. K. Teo, Theta series and magic numbers for close-packed spherical clusters, J. Chem. Phys. 83 (1985) 6520-6534.
Index entries for sequences related to f.c.c. lattice
mathematica: QP = QPochhammer; s = 2 QP[q^2]^3*QP[q^4]^2/QP[q]^2 + O[q]^75; CoefficientList[s, q] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jul 04 2017 *)
program: (PARI) A045828(n)={ if(n<0, 0, A=x*O(x^n) ; polcoeff( eta(x^2+A)^3*eta(x^4+A)^2/eta(x+A)^2, n) ; ) ; }
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
ext: More terms from _R. J. Mathar_, Jun 06 2007
